item.title: Mayor Mamdani Appoints a Team of Government Veterans
item.description: Zohran Mamdani has stocked his administration with seasoned officials, in part to allay concerns about his inexperience and left-wing stances.

item.title: Crans-Montana is a Historic Swiss Ski Resort Popular with International Tourists
item.description: Known for its gourmet food, luxury stores, and for hosting major sporting events, the high-end resort was acquired by Vail Resorts in 2024.
